title: Mac Essentials
description:
This is a collection of essential Mac OS X 10.5 software/DMG\\\&#039;s for a new system/reinstall. I\\\&#039;m uploading this for a friend but figured I might as well release it to the world.

This Torrent Contains the following applications:

Adium 1.2.3 - The most kick ass chat client on the face of the planet
Adobe Design Premium CS3 - If you don\\\&#039;t know what this is... you\\\&#039;re an idiot
iLife \\\&#039;08 - iPhoto, iMovie etc etc etc
iWork \\\&#039;08 - Pages, Numbers, Keynote. A Basic set of office applications
Mac OS X 10.5 Leopard - Once again, kinda obvious
Microsoft Office 2008 - Microsoft Office 2008, does what it says on the tin
Skype 2.7 - AWESOME-O calling system, pwns everything on a MacBook
Toast 8 Titanium - Great burning application, has a few bugs on Leopard
Transmission 1.06 - Simply the best torrent application for OS X/Linux
VMWare Fusion 1.1.1 - Run Winblows on your Mac, yey /sarcasm

Please seed as much as you can, 14GB isnt exactly a walk in the park for me at the moment.

I will try and seed 24/7 but there will be interruptions, but that just gives everyone a chance to fix up their ratio.

Have fun, if you like it, leave a comment.

btw, i&#039;m seeding this with encryption, so use Transmission or Azureus to download it
